text: [Faristagon] Guftand: «Ej Lut, mo firistodagoni Parvardigorat hastem. Onon hargiz ʙa tu dast namejoʙand, pas, vaqte pose az saʙ guzarad, xonavodaatro [az in sahr ʙerun] ʙiʙar va hec jak az sumo ʙa pusti sar nigoh nakunad, magar hamsarat, ki on ci [az azoʙ], ki ʙa onon merasad, hatman, ʙa u [niz] xohad rasid. Dar haqiqat, va'dagohason suʙh ast. Ojo suʙh nazdik nest?»
